original_text:
for those blessed by the Lord shall inherit the land,
    but those cursed by him shall be cut off.
korean_text: 주의 복을 받은 자들은 땅을 차지하고 주의 저주를 받은 자들은 끊어지리로다

sentences.original_text: for those blessed by the Lord shall inherit the land
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 복 주신 자들은 땅을 차지하리라

sentences.original_text: but those cursed by him shall be cut off
